page.title: 15Customs
page.content: {The Christingle} The Christingle Service has been celebrated at the Church of St. Mary for 8 years. The Children's Society first started the service here although the ceremony first started in Bohemia. People go to church and listen to the Studham School children taking the service. I was Mary last year. I enjoyed taking part.Father John gives all the children oranges which represent the world.The oranges have red bands around the middle which represent the equator. The oranges also have 4 cocktail sticks in them with nuts and sweets.There is a short white candle in the middle. The sticks represent the 4 corners of the earth and the candle represents the light of the world. Kelly and Kirsty
